From Adam Quigley’s fantastic, detailed look back on six years of Lost after seeing the final episode:

“Across the Sea”, the Jacob/Man in Black flashback episode, is the break-up.

For some, I suspect the series finale was the make-up sex.

For me, the series finale was like being forced to watch my six-year lover blow another guy.

For me it was make up sex followed by an empty feeling a couple of days after I’d realised what I’d done. Nonetheless, a bad breakup doesn’t nullify 6 years of good times.
